title: Opening Remarks by Governor Tarullo
content: For release on delivery  9:00 a.m. EST  December 2, 2015        Opening Remarks    by    Daniel K. Tarullo     Member    Board of Governors of the Federal Reserve System   at the   Economic Growth and Regulatory Paperwork Reduction Act Outreach Meeting   Arlington, Virginia    December 2, 2015
